title: Add two uploaded photos to 'Our Beautiful Moments' section and arrange all photos

requirements.text: Add the two uploaded photos (IMG_20260221_145437.jpg and IMG_20260221_145437-1.jpg) to the 'Our Beautiful Moments' gallery section alongside existing photos

quotes: Add this photo in "our beautiful moments section" arrange all photo

acceptanceCriteria: Both uploaded photos (IMG_20260221_145437.jpg and IMG_20260221_145437-1.jpg) are visible in the GallerySection component
Photos are stored as static assets in frontend/public/assets/
All photos in the gallery section are displayed with consistent styling using FramedGalleryImage component

requirements.text: Arrange all photos in the 'Our Beautiful Moments' gallery section in an organized grid layout
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays all photos (existing + newly added) in a clean, organized grid
Grid layout is responsive and maintains visual balance across different screen sizes
Photo arrangement follows the existing staggered fade-in animation pattern

constraints: Do not modify the FramedGalleryImage component structure
Maintain the existing intersection observer-based fade-in animation for the gallery
Keep the romantic theme and styling consistent with the existing design
